net.chwthewke.hamcrest.equivalence
Interface Equivalence<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type over which the relation acts.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApproximateEqualityEquivalence, EqualityEquivalence, IdentityEquivalence, IterableEquivalence, LiftedEquivalence, NullAwareEquivalence
public interface Equivalence<T>

This interface defines a relation over a type, computed and described with hamcrest matchers.

Method Summary
 org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> equivalentTo(T expected)
          Partially evaluates the relation.
 

Method Detail

equivalentTo

org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> equivalentTo(T expected)
Partially evaluates the relation.

Parameters:
expected - An object of the acted-upon type.
Returns:
A Matcher (predicate) of equivalence to the expected object.
